snippet.title: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast 2 - PS3 / X360 - Revelations Trailer (TGS 2010)
snippet.description:
Ever wondered what to expect with Dragon Ball: Raging Blast 2?

Fight with up to 100 rival characters in various modes of gameplay, use transformations to power-up your fighter, unleash your power with new techniques and challenge the world online! 
On top of that, the game has completely re-vamped its graphics and includes full length anime movie!

Want more?

Join the Super Saiyans team on the Dragon Ball Games facebook page : http://www.facebook.com/DBZ.videogames or visit your local Namco Bandai Games website : http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Dragon Ball: Raging Blast 2 is schedule for November 5th on PS3 and X360

Check out your local Namco Bandai website for more information on our other titles: http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/
